name.ja: <ruby>Ｎｏｕｖｅｌｌｅｚ<rt>ヌーベルズ</rt></ruby> <ruby>Ａｕｂｅｒｇｅ<rt>オーベルジュ</rt></ruby> 『<ruby>À Ｔａｂｌｅ<rt>ア・ターブル</rt></ruby>』

text.en: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Recipe" card from your Deck or GY to your hand. Once per turn: You can place 1 Ritual Monster from your hand on the bottom of the Deck; draw 1 card. During your End Phase: You can target 2 cards in your GY, including a "Recipe" card; place them on the bottom of the Deck in any order, then draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Nouvellez Auberge "À Table"" per turn.
